== Kasaragod (M) (803255) ==

Kasaragod (M) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 16.69 sq. km. and harbouring 10202 households with total population of 54172 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 630 km. Male population is 26319 and female population is 27853. Scheduled Caste population is 1543 and Scheduled Tribes population is 166. Census Location Code of the town is 803255<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 209 km. Railway station is at Kasaragod at a distance of 0 km.
